name: Plush Stuffed Toy
prompt: A VibeDeck controller as a soft plush stuffed toy. Made of fuzzy fleece and felt fabric. Buttons are embroidered or soft fabric circles. The rotary knob is a stuffed pom-pom that can spin. Cute button eyes added to make it look like a character. Soft pastel colors - mint green, baby pink, lavender. Visible stitching and seams. Huggable and soft. The LCD is embroidered text. Sitting on a child's bed. Soft warm lighting.
why: Cute factor, unexpected softness, kawaii appeal
